      • placeOrder

        public void placeOrder(java.lang.String menuName)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Takes the menu name and increments its popularity. It also decreases all the supplies of this menu item by 1 and if one of the supplies was already missing then it throws an exception and does not place the order.
        Parameters:
        menuName -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • updateSchedule

        public void updateSchedule(int staffPosition,
                           int dotwPosition,
                           java.sql.Time start,
                           java.sql.Time end)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Modifies the staff's start and end time for a specific day of the week. If the start time is after the end time then it throws an exception.
        Parameters:
        staffPosition -
        dotwPosition -
        start -
        end -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
